vulnerabilities: Use of Incorrectly-Resolved Name or Reference
description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal attacks (CWE-22) as it uses user input to construct a file path without properly sanitizing it. This could allow an attacker to access arbitrary files on the system. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to Use of Incorrectly-Resolved Name or Reference (CWE-706) as it uses the 'fileName' variable which can be manipulated by an attacker to reference unintended files.
